item.title: 微策略公司玩转比特币引发纳斯达克 100 指数纳入问题
item.description: 迈克尔-赛勒（Michael Saylor）的微策略公司（MicroStrategy Inc.【原文：Michael Saylor’s MicroStrategy Inc. checks all the boxes for inclusion in the Nasdaq 100 Index, a development that would trigger purchases of the shares by the $451 billion worth of exchange-traded funds around the world that directly track the benchmark.】

item.title: 斯塔达在 15 亿多欧元首次公开募股前向投资者征求意见
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Stada Arzneimittel AG 公司正在为其首次公开募股寻找投资者，有可能为这家以消费者健康为重点的制药商筹集到约 15 亿欧元（16 亿美元）的新资金。【原文：Stada Arzneimittel AG is sounding out investors for its initial public offering that could potentially raise around €1.5 billion ($1.6 billion) of fresh capital for the consumer health-focused drugmaker, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: ServiceNow 重组 RiseUp 劳动力培训计划并裁员
item.description: 服务诺公司（ServiceNow Inc. ）正在重组其用户培训项目 RiseUp，因为就业率很低，而且企业对以多元化为重点的计划也很反感。【原文：ServiceNow Inc. is restructuring its user training program RiseUp amid low job placement rates and a corporate backlash to diversity-focused initiatives.】

item.title: 国债不再像以前那样随通胀数据波动
item.description: 29 万亿美元的国债市场对新公布的美国通胀数据的波动幅度已经变小，因为这些数据更加符合市场的一致预期。【原文：Swings in the $29 trillion Treasury market have gotten smaller in reaction to fresh US inflation data as the releases have become more aligned with consensus expectations.】

item.title: 阿尔伯森交易失败后，克罗格加入回购债务的行列
item.description: 克罗格公司（Kroger Co.）在试图收购阿尔伯森公司（Albertsons Cos.）被法官阻止后，成为可能被迫向投资者回购债务的最新一家公司。【原文：Kroger Co. has become the latest company that may be forced to buy back debt from investors after its attempt to purchase Albertsons Cos. was blocked by judges.】

item.title: 阿根廷通胀意外降温，米莱再次获胜
item.description: 阿根廷的月通胀率放缓至 2020 年 7 月以来的最低水平，使哈维尔-米莱伊总统在上任一年后又一次在选民最关心的问题上取得了胜利。【原文：Argentina’s monthly inflation slowed to the lowest level since July 2020, handing President Javier Milei another victory on voters’ biggest concern a year after taking office.】

item.title: 美国 11 月赤字因医疗和国防开支增加而扩大
item.description: 本财年前两个月，美国预算赤字再次扩大，主要原因是医疗、国防和社会保障支出增加。【原文：The US budget deficit widened once again in the first two months of the fiscal year, driven primarily by higher spending on health, defense and Social Security.】

item.title: 布林肯不排除撤消雪佛龙在委内瑞拉的许可证的可能性
item.description: 国务卿安东尼-布林肯（Antony Blinken）表示，拜登政府希望在卸任前加大对总统尼古拉斯-马杜罗（Nicolás Maduro）的压力，因此有可能吊销雪佛龙公司在委内瑞拉的石油生产许可证。【原文：Secretary of State Antony Blinken left open the possibility of revoking Chevron Corp.’s license to produce oil in Venezuela, as the Biden administration looks to ramp up pressure on President Nicolás Maduro before leaving office.】

item.title: 美联储为 12 月通胀开绿灯，为 2025 年通胀开黄灯
item.description: 新的通胀数据可能会让美联储对降息步伐更加谨慎，但目前还不会。【原文：Fresh inflation figures are likely to make the Federal Reserve more cautious about the pace of interest-rate cuts — but not quite yet.】

item.title: 爱马仕家族洽谈投资法国保险公司 Albingia
item.description: 由爱马仕家族成员支持的一个家族办公室有可能成为法国保险公司 Albingia 的买家之一，这项投资表明他们的目标是将财富从奢侈品中分散出来。【原文：A family office backed by members of the Hermes fortune are among the likely buyers of French insurer Albingia, in an investment that signals a goal to diversify their wealth away from luxury.】

item.title: 斯图尔伯格自 2016 年以来首次押注巴西股市
item.description: 路易斯-斯图尔伯格（Luis Stuhlberger）正在重启他八年前下的一个赌注，以防止巴西股市下跌，因为交易商质疑政府对解决日益增长的预算赤字的承诺。【原文：Luis Stuhlberger is reviving a bet he last made eight years ago to seek protection against declines in Brazilian stocks as traders question the government’s commitment to fixing a growing budget deficit.】

item.title: 欧盟认为乌克兰过境协议终止对天然气影响 "微不足道
item.description: 根据欧盟委员会进行的一项评估，俄罗斯天然气停止流经乌克兰将对欧洲价格产生 "微不足道 "的影响。【原文：The end of Russian natural gas flows through Ukraine will have a “negligible” impact on European prices, according to an assessment carried out by the European Commission.】

item.title: 花旗财富敦促投资者放眼 2025 年的 S&P 500 指数涨幅

But investors probably should look for opportunities beyond the usual suspects.】

item.title: 犹他州豪华滑雪胜地为新开发项目申请 3 亿美元市政债务
item.description: 鹿谷度假村（Deer Valley Resort）是卡戴珊姐妹（Kardashians）和其他追求坡边奢华人士的冬季乐园，正朝着北美最大的滑雪度假村之一迈进。【原文：Deer Valley Resort, the winter playground for the Kardashians and others searching for slopeside luxury, is on its way to becoming one of the largest ski resorts in North America.】

item.title: 德国放弃大规模扩建天然气发电厂的计划
item.description: 德国经济部表示，由于缺乏政治支持，德国已放弃大规模扩建燃气发电厂的计划。【原文：Germany has dropped plans for a major expansion of gas-fired power plants because of an absence of political support, the Economy Ministry said.】

item.title: 纽约是大城市中通货膨胀率最高的城市
item.description: 在住房和家庭能源成本的推动下，纽约人正在应对美国最大的物价上涨。【原文：New Yorkers are coping with the US’s biggest price increases, driven by housing and household energy costs.】

item.title: Grifols 发行 13 亿欧元债务以平息投资者情绪
item.description: Grifols SA 在一次私人配售债务中筹集了 13 亿欧元（14 亿美元），这家西班牙制药商试图向投资者保证其管理借款的能力。【原文：Grifols SA raised €1.3 billion ($1.4 billion) in a private debt placement, as the Spanish drugmaker seeks to reassure investors about its ability to manage borrowings.】

item.title: 网络审查委员会暂时处理电信黑客事件
item.description: 2023年3月9日星期四，美国得克萨斯州休斯敦，网络安全和基础设施安全局（CISA）局长珍-伊斯特里（Jen Easterly）在S&P全球公司举办的2023年CERAWeek会议上。全球能源行业正面临着巨大的不确定性和变化--全球大流行病的影响、地缘政治的变化和世界主要能源大国之一发起的战争、高昂的能源价格、供应链和基础设施的限制以及经济的不稳定。摄影师F. Carter Smith/Bloomberg【原文：Jen Easterly, director of Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency (CISA), during the 2023 CERAWeek by S&P Global conference in Houston, Texas, US, on Thursday, March 9, 2023. The global energy industry is facing a welter of uncertainty and change -- driven by the effects of the global pandemic; shifting geopolitics and a war launched by one of the world's major energy powers; high energy prices; supply chain and infrastructure constraints; and economic instability. Photographer: F. Carter Smith/Bloomberg】

item.title: 特斯拉股价在六周内上涨 5150 亿美元之际跃升至创纪录水平
item.description: 特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc. ）股价攀升至 2021 年 11 月以来的首个盘中纪录，该公司的自动驾驶雄心在当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的下届政府的推动下得到了乐观情绪的鼓舞。【原文：Tesla Inc. shares climbed to their first intraday record since November 2021, buoyed by optimism the company’s self-driving ambitions can get a boost under President-elect Donald Trump’s next administration.】

item.title: 美中经济会谈重启，耶伦敦促保持联系
item.description: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）在可能是两国高级官员最后一轮经济和金融会谈前夕发表讲话，敦促下一届美国政府保持她与中国重新建立的对话渠道。【原文：Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen urged the next US administration to maintain the dialogue channels that she re-established with China, speaking on the eve of what’s likely to be the last round of economic and financial talks between senior officials from the two nations.】

item.title: 道明银行前分行员工在持续洗钱案中被起诉
item.description: 美国司法部已逮捕并指控另一名多伦多道明银行前雇员共谋洗钱，这是最新一起与该银行美国零售业务大规模合规失误有关的指控。【原文：The US Department of Justice has arrested and charged another former Toronto-Dominion Bank employee with conspiracy to launder money, the latest in a string of charges tied to the lender’s massive compliance failures at its American retail business.】

item.title: 特拉菲古拉公司辩称瑞士贿赂案是一场不公正的 "十字军东征
item.description: Trafigura 集团的律师辩称，该集团面临的贿赂指控是瑞士检察官不公正 "讨伐 "的一部分，他们正在审查该行业主要中心的大宗商品交易行为。【原文：Lawyers for Trafigura Group argued that the bribery charges it faces are part of an unjust “crusade” by Swiss prosecutors who are scrutinizing commodity trading practices in a major hub for the industry.】

item.title: 特朗普关税风险激荡金银，纽约金银价格跳涨
item.description: 纽约黄金和白银期货溢价上涨，因为交易商们在权衡美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普提出的全面关税措施中是否可能包括贵金属。【原文：Premiums for gold and silver futures in New York swelled as traders weighed the possibility of precious metals being included in sweeping tariff measures proposed by US President-elect Donald Trump.】

item.title: 汉莎航空呼吁暂停与卡塔尔的欧盟航班协议
item.description: 德国汉莎航空公司（Deutsche Lufthansa AG）呼吁欧盟暂停与卡塔尔的双边航空协议，理由是对这个海湾国家的腐败指控。【原文：Deutsche Lufthansa AG called on the European Union to suspend its bilateral aviation agreement with Qatar, citing corruption allegations against the Gulf state that also owns Qatar Airways.】

item.title: 官员称中国正敦促电动汽车公司投资南非
item.description: 中国正鼓励其电动汽车制造商到南非投资，以扩大两国之间的联系。【原文：China is encouraging its electrical vehicle manufacturers to invest in South Africa as it seeks to broaden ties between the two nations.】

item.title: 埃克森正在探索为数据中心提供低碳电源
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司正在为一家大型天然气发电厂配备碳捕集设备，努力为数据中心提供无排放电力。【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. is working to provide emission-free electricity to data centers by equipping a large natural gas-fired power plant with carbon-capture equipment.】

item.title: 消息称博世即将达成向 Triton 出售安防资产的交易
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，罗伯特-博世公司（Robert Bosch GmbH）即将达成一项交易，将其部分安防系统业务出售给私募股权公司 Triton Partners，这家德国零部件供应商将继续削减其投资组合。【原文：Robert Bosch GmbH is nearing a deal to sell some of its security systems operations to private equity firm Triton Partners, according to people familiar with the matter, as the German parts supplier continues to trim its portfolio.】
